price: 有学问和有正信的人说：“依安拉的前定，你们确已逗留到复活日。这就是复活日，但你们不知道。”
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡعِلۡمَ وَٱلۡإِيمَٰنَ لَقَدۡ لَبِثۡتُمۡ فِي كِتَٰبِ ٱللَّهِ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡبَعۡثِۖ فَهَٰذَا يَوۡمُ ٱلۡبَعۡثِ وَلَٰكِنَّكُمۡ كُنتُمۡ لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqāla alladhīna ūtū al-ʿil'ma wal-īmāna laqad labith'tum fī kitābi al-lahi ilā yawmi al-baʿthi fahādhā yawmu al-baʿthi walākinnakum kuntum lā taʿlamūna
